name: Taddle Quest
description:
Prepare for adventure

Depending on whether you are in melee or long-range combat
You can enter battle with two sets of skills
You can switch between them at any time during the battle.
Do you want to be a mage or a fighter?
The choice is entirely yours.

New enemies are on the horizon!

The main focus of this game is on boss battles.
Powerful enemies will attack in a variety of ways.
Watch the enemy's movements carefully before you fight.

A freely matching equipment system

Each weapon has its own exclusive attack action.
You can freely mix and match the weapons in both hands
You can mix and match weapons in both hands to feel the difference.
When you change your equipment, the look also changes.
Match your fighting style to the characteristics of your equipment.
